TEXT.TITLE: OKLAHOMA CITY FEEDERS STEADY - USDA
TEXT.BODY: feeder cattle steady amid good demand, the usda said. steers - medium, few large, frame 1 - 540-600 lbs 75.30-81.50, 650-700 lbs 70.05-73.90 and 700-800 lbs 70.20-73.20. heifers - medium frame 1 - 550-600 lbs 66.50-71.00, 625-700 lbs 66.00-68.10 and 700-800 lbs 64.50-67.80. Reuter
